folderOrganization.description: Organize templates in a 2-level folder hierarchy. Keep your documents structured and easy to find.

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing

step1.description: Upload your DOCX file with custom document properties defined where you want dynamic content.

guides.title: Template Preparation Guide
guides.subtitle: Learn how to create Word templates that work perfectly with Rexfill

customProperties.title: Using Custom Document Properties
customProperties.intro: Custom document properties in Word allow you to store dynamic data that can be inserted throughout your document using DOCPROPERTY fields.
customProperties.howTo: How to add custom properties in Word:
customProperties.step1: Go to File > Info > Properties > Advanced Properties
customProperties.step3: Add a name and value for your property (e.g., CustomerName, OrderNumber)
customProperties.insertField: How to insert custom property fields in your document:
customProperties.insertStep1: Press Ctrl+F9 to create a field
customProperties.insertStep3: Press F9 to update the field
customProperties.benefit: Rexfill will detect these properties and allow you to update their values. All DOCPROPERTY fields in the document will automatically reflect the new values.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.tip1: Use descriptive property names like CustomerName instead of single letters
bestPractices.tip2: Keep property names consistent across your templates
bestPractices.tip3: Test your template with a small document first before batch processing
bestPractices.tip4: Use DOCPROPERTY fields for text that appears multiple times in your document
bestPractices.tip5: Save your template as .docx format (not .doc or other formats)

issue1.title: Properties not detected
issue1.solution: Make sure you've added custom properties via File > Info > Properties > Advanced Properties > Custom tab. Properties must be saved to the document.

issue2.title: Fields not updating in Word
issue2.solution: After processing, open the document in Word and press Ctrl+A then F9 to update all fields. Or enable 'Update fields before printing' in Word options.

issue3.title: File won't upload
issue3.solution: Ensure your file is in .docx format and under the size limit for your plan. Try saving the document again in Word.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

response.title: Response Time
response.description: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

contact.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Rexfill, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
dataCollection.item1: Account information (authentication via Internet Identity or Google)
dataCollection.item2: Documents you upload for processing (stored securely)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to:

dataStorage.title: Data Storage & Security
dataStorage.content: Your documents and data are stored securely on the Internet Computer blockchain through Juno. This decentralized architecture ensures your data is encrypted and only accessible by you.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.item1: Right to access your personal data
rights.item2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.item3: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies only for essential functionality like remembering your language preference and authentication state. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics cookies.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.content: We use Paddle as our payment processor for subscription management. When you subscribe, Paddle processes your payment information according to their privacy policy. We never store your credit card details directly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your GDPR rights, please contact us at privacy@rexfill.com.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Rexfill, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Rexfill is a document template processing service that allows you to upload Word documents with placeholders and fill them with dynamic data. The service is provided 'as is' and we reserve the right to modify or discontinue features at any time.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: To use Rexfill, you must authenticate using Internet Identity or Google. You are responsible for:
accounts.item1: Maintaining the security of your authentication credentials
accounts.item2: All activities that occur under your account
accounts.item3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized access

payments.title: Subscriptions & Payments
payments.content: Paid subscriptions are processed through Paddle, our merchant of record:
payments.item2: You may cancel at any time; access continues until the end of the billing period
payments.item3: Refunds are handled according to Paddle's refund policy

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use Rexfill to:
acceptableUse.item1: Upload or process illegal, harmful, or offensive content
acceptableUse.item2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
acceptableUse.item3: Interfere with the service or other users' access
acceptableUse.item4: Use automated systems to access the service beyond normal use

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: You retain all rights to the documents you upload and process. Rexfill and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and protected by international copyright and trademark laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Rexfill shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately, though you may request export of your data.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes via email or in-app notification. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@rexfill.com.
